snippet: The lofty price Microsoft paid AOL for 800 patents - $1.3 million each - reflects the crucial role patents are playing in the business and legal strategies of technology companies. Read more »
abstract: The lofty price Microsoft paid AOL for 800 patents - $1.3 million each - reflects the crucial role patents are playing in the business and legal strategies of technology companies. Read more »

headline.main: Microsoft's AOL Deal Intensifies Patent Wars
